headline.main: Texas Death Row Inmate Danny Bible Loses at US Supreme Court
headline.print_headline: Texas Death Row Inmate Danny Bible Loses at US Supreme Court

docs.snippet: The U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday refused an appeal from Texas death row inmate Danny Paul Bible, who was convicted of the 1979 icepick slaying of a woman who went to his house in Houston to use a telephone and was found later stabbed 11 times, ra...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday refused an appeal from Texas death row inmate Danny Paul Bible, who was convicted of the 1979 icepick slaying of a woman who went to his house in Houston to use a telephone and was found later stabbed 11 times, raped and dumped on the bank of a bayou.

docs.snippet: Colin Kaepernick, who has caused controversy by kneeling during the U.S. national anthem, has been named the starting quarterback for the National Football League's San Francisco 49ers, the team said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Colin Kaepernick, who has caused controversy by kneeling during the U.S. national anthem, has been named the starting quarterback for the National Football League's San Francisco 49ers, the team said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Chicago Mayor Seeks Rebound With New Budget, Labor Peace
headline.print_headline: Chicago Mayor Seeks Rebound With New Budget, Labor Peace

docs.snippet: Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel moved this week to bolster his sagging political fortunes, delivering within a few hours both a labor pact with the city's teachers and a no-drama 2017 city budget devoid of any big tax hikes....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel moved this week to bolster his sagging political fortunes, delivering within a few hours both a labor pact with the city's teachers and a no-drama 2017 city budget devoid of any big tax hikes.

headline.main: Never Decided AIB IPO Would Be in 2017-Irish Finance Minister
headline.print_headline: Never Decided AIB IPO Would Be in 2017-Irish Finance Minister

docs.snippet: Ireland never decided for certain it would offer a 25 percent stake in state-owned Allied Irish Banks next year and will sell when the time is right, Finance Minister Michael Noonan said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ireland never decided for certain it would offer a 25 percent stake in state-owned Allied Irish Banks next year and will sell when the time is right, Finance Minister Michael Noonan said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Metaphorically Speaking, Men Are Expected to be Struck by Genius, Women to Nurture It

docs.snippet: Research into the metaphors used to describe inventions found that they carried implicit associations about men and women’s stereotypical gender roles....
docs.abstract: Psychologists have found that gender of inventor is factor in how scientific discoveries and ideas are rated.
docs.lead_paragraph: Research into the metaphors used to describe inventions found that they carried implicit associations about men and women’s stereotypical gender roles.

headline.main: U.S. Blacklists Pakistan Nationals on Suspicion of Money Laundering
headline.print_headline: U.S. Blacklists Pakistan Nationals on Suspicion of Money Laundering

docs.snippet: The United States blacklisted four men and their companies based in Pakistan and the United Arab Emirates on Tuesday, for purported ties to an organization accused of laundering money for drug traffickers and Chinese, Colombian and Mexican crime g...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States blacklisted four men and their companies based in Pakistan and the United Arab Emirates on Tuesday, for purported ties to an organization accused of laundering money for drug traffickers and Chinese, Colombian and Mexican crime groups.
